dialog_1.name: The Insufferably Charming Imprisoner
dialog_1.text: Ah, hello there, adventurer. Yes, you—the one with the completely useless firearm. Welcome to my humble little death trap.

dialog_2.name: The Insufferably Charming Imprisoner
dialog_2.text: You've stumbled into my dungeon and the door has sealed behind you. Those four ominous pots with bleeding skull eyes? Cursed, obviously.

dialog_3.name: The Insufferably Charming Imprisoner
dialog_3.text: Break all four by running into them to lift the curse and open the exit door.

dialog_4.name: The Insufferably Charming Imprisoner
dialog_4.text: About your skeletal houseguests—they spawn every few seconds from that far door. Their touch hurts you terribly while leaving them completely unperturbed.

dialog_5.name: The Insufferably Charming Imprisoner
dialog_5.text: Fortunately, they spontaneously combust after a short while. Saves on cleanup, really.

dialog_6.name: The Insufferably Charming Imprisoner
dialog_6.text: That impressive weapon you're carrying? Completely ornamental, I'm afraid.

dialog_7.name: The Insufferably Charming Imprisoner
dialog_7.text: You'll have to rely on WASD or arrow keys to scamper about, and space bar for those charming little hops we call 'jumping.'

dialog_8.name: The Insufferably Charming Imprisoner
dialog_8.text: So: Break four bleeding pots, avoid continuously spawning combustible undead, escape through the unsealed door. Try not to die.

dialog_9.name: The Insufferably Charming Imprisoner
dialog_9.text: Best of luck. Do try to make it interesting—I get so dreadfully bored down here.
